enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students must also register for Physics 136-2.
Add both classes to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.
title: WCAS PHYSICS 130-2-01 College Physics

instructors.instructor_addr: Technological Institute (2145 Sheridan Road), Room F-226, Evanston

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Algebra-based physics primarily for premedical students who do not need to
take calculus-based physics. Topics covered are similar to those of 135-1,2,3.

1. Static electricity
2. Electric fields
3. Electrical potentials
4. D.C. Circuits
5. Capacitors
6. Magnetic fields
7. Inductance
8. Inductors
9. A.C. Circuits
10. E and M waves

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: Three 1-hour lectures per week with demonstrations, weekly discussion section, two-hour laboratory registered for separately.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: 2 midterms, a final exam, 6 weekly quizzes (drop lowest).

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
Giancoli Physics 7th ed. Pearson
2nd Quarter Lab Manual (available at Norris)

subject: PHYSICS
